Containers.Name: MagRack
Containers.Description: MagRack is a lightweight java based application to make reading PDF files (magazines) more convienent. This application does not download magazines. It is expected the user aleady has automation setup for magazine downloading.[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/mags[/b] This is the location where your magazines are located.[br][br] Don't forget to enter in the host port and the magazine folder location. [br][br] [span style='color: #E80000;']4567[/span] is the WebUI port[br] To access MagRack, open the WebUI.[br][br]
Containers.Overview: MagRack is a lightweight java based application to make reading PDF files (magazines) more convienent. This application does not download magazines. It is expected the user aleady has automation setup for magazine downloading.
